RuleSet.Name: src/Schema/jpa/SchemaTableH.java
RuleSet.Descr: Java JPA implementation of a $TableName$ history buffer object.

GenFile.Name: fileSchemaTableHJPAJava
GenFile.BasePackageName: $reference ManufacturingSchema lower JavaPackage$.$reference ManufacturingSchema lower SchemaName$/src/main/java
GenFile.SubPackageName: $reference ManufacturingSchema lower JavaPackage$.$reference ManufacturingSchema lower SchemaName$.jpa

RuleSet.GenRule: @Inheritance(strategy = InheritanceType.TABLE_PER_CLASS)$baseTableJpaDiscriminatorColumn$
implements Comparable<Object>, Serializable
,$jpaTableHIndexAnnotation$
$switch IsPrimaryIndex yes jpaTableHPrimaryIndexAnnotation default jpaTableHOrdinaryIndexAnnotation$
@Index(name = "$IndexName$_h", columnList = "$jpaTableHIndexColumnList$", unique = $switch IsUnique yes true default false$)
@Index(name = "$IndexName$_h", columnList = "auditClusterId, auditStamp, auditAction, revision, auditSessionId, $jpaTableHIndexColumnList$", unique = true)
$iterate Columns( each CommaDbColumnName first DbColumnName empty empty )$
@Id protected $reference BaseClass SchemaName$$reference BaseClass TableName$HPKey pkey;
$switch HasSuperClassRelation no implHJPAOptImplAuditColumnAccessors default empty$
$switch HasAuditColumns yes implHJPAColumnOptAuditGetterSetters default empty$
$switch HasSuperClassRelation yes empty default implHJPAColumnOptAuditGetterSetters$
$switch HasAuditColumns yes implHJPAColumnAuditGetterSetters default empty$
$implHJPAPKeyAccessors$$reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( each implHJPAPKeyAttrAccessors empty empty )$$implHJPADataGetterSetters$
$iterate DataColumns( each implColumnGetterSetter empty empty )$
$iterate DataColumns( each implColumnJPAAttr empty empty )$
extends $SchemaName$$reference SuperClassRelation reference ToTable TableName$H
public $SchemaName$$TableName$H() {$switch HasSuperClassRelation yes implHJPAConstructorInvokeSuper default implHJPAConstructorInitPKey$$implHJPAConstructorInitDataColumns$ }
// The primary key member attributes are initialized on construction pkey = new $SchemaName$$TableName$HPKey();
super();
$iterate DataColumns( each implConstructorInitAttr empty empty )$
$SchemaName$$TableName$HPKey rhs = ($SchemaName$$TableName$HPKey)obj;$reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( each implEqualsCmpAttr )$ return( true );
$implHJPAEqualsPKey$$implHJPAEqualsHPKey$
int hashCode = pkey.hashCode();
int hashCode = super.hashCode();
throw new CFLibUnsupportedClassException( getClass(), "compareTo", "obj", obj, null );
$switch IsPrimaryIndex yes empty default implHJPACompareToIndexKey$
return( super.compareTo(obj) );
$implHPKeyCompareToAuditClusterId$$implHPKeyCompareToAuditStamp$$implHPKeyCompareToAuditActionId$$implHPKeyCompareToRequiredRevision$$implHPKeyCompareToAuditSessionId$
$implHPKeyEqualsAuditClusterId$$implHPKeyEqualsAuditStamp$$implHPKeyEqualsAuditActionId$$implHPKeyEqualsRequiredRevision$$implHPKeyEqualsAuditSessionId$
$switch IsPrimaryIndex yes empty default implHJPAMethCompareToIndex$
$reference BaseClass reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( each implJPASetCopyPKeyCol )$
super.set$reference SuperClassRelation reference ToTable TableName$( src );
@Override
